title: # 334 - Dane Cook & ME
description:
I sit down with Dane Cook to talk about our long history, how he used myspace to get a large fanbase, touring arenas, mistakes, making movies, why he never drank or smoked, his parents, and much more!

This episode is brought to you by Zip Recruiter. Try Zip Recruiter for free today by going to www.ziprecruiter.com/bertcast  

This episode is also brought to you by Four Sigmatic. Get 15% off of your order using the promo code “Bertcast” or by going to www.foursigmatic.com/bertcast 

This episode is also brought to you by Calm. Get 25% off of a Calm premium subscription by going to www.calm.com/bert 

This episode is brought to you by Butcher Box. New subscribers will receive 2 LBS of FREE ground beef for life plus $20 off of your first box at www.Butcherbox.com/bert 

Tickets to my “Body Shots” world tour are on sale now!


For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
